attributes.action: use the downturn in the building sector to create a social bulding scheme using the unemployed tradespersons to build and refurbish houses, schools, hospitals and jails.Providing employment to many and kick starting the supply industry.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are many unemployed or soon to be unemployed building tradespersons. We should take this opportunity to use these talents to build more council / social housing, schools, hospitals and jails. Using there abilities to renovate / refurbish those schools, jails and hospitals already in use. With this scheme we would also create a need for materials / supply - this would keep production going and secure jobs. We should take this opportunity to move forward and be prepared for the future, eventually we will need these houses and schools etc. we must not allow these valuble skills to be lost. By building and extending property life we will be helping our economy and show we want to be better.
